original_text: until I come and take you away to a land like your own land, a land of grain and wine, a land of bread and vineyards.
korean_text: 내가 와서 너희를 너희 본토와 같이 곡식과 포도주와 떡과 포도원이 있는 땅에 옮기기까지 하리라

sentences.original_text: until I come and take you away
to a land like your own land
a land of grain and wine
a land of bread and vineyards
